Name: LinearShooter Remixed
About the game: 'LinearShooter Remixed' is a game that combines vertical scrolling bullet hell shmup with rogue-lite that combine power-ups to build builds. Let's aim to clear the stage by assembling your ship with power-up while getting drunk with minimal and beautiful graphics and trance music. ■ Simple and full-scale bullet hell shmup Not only are they beautiful, they hunt down players in a variety of patterns. Shoot and defeat your enemies while avoid bullet hell. ■ Randomly generated stages and power-ups Five stages and power-ups that change with each play. ■ Power-ups that become stronger with combinations Power-ups obtain along the way create powerful synergies when combined with other power-ups. - Homing bullet × 3-way shot × missile = 3-way guided missile - Variable angle shot × increased number of shots × laser = variable angle extra-thick laser You can create a ship that shoots your favorite shots. ■ Various game modes Various modes are available, such as modes with different difficulty levels and endless modes. ■ Supports achievements and leaderboards Compete with players from all over the world for scores and aim for higher rankings. It also supports the achievement function. Let's aim to unlock all achievements.
